original_title: Mormon Tabernacle Choir Presents The Joy of Christmas with Angela Lansbury
overview: The Joy of Christmas combines the talent of the world-famous Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square with one of the most enduring and beloved stars of film, theater, and television: Angela Lansbury.

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus-Christ of Latter-Day Saints

tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
title: Mormon Tabernacle Choir Presents The Joy of Christmas with Angela Lansbury
